about.name: Muhamad
about.title: Fullstack Developer
about.subTitle: I develop web apps, dynamic interfaces, and full-stack solutions
about.description: With 5+ years of hands-on development experience, I craft seamless digital solutions from concept to deployment. My work bridges intuitive user experiences with robust technical foundations, whether building scalable applications, mentoring future developers, or collaborating in Agile environments. Passionate about problem-solving and continuous growth, I thrive on turning complex challenges into elegant, user-centric products.

timeline.summary: Mentored students in full-stack web development, teaching frontend (HTML/CSS/JS, React.js, Tailwind CSS) and backend (PHP, MySQL, Laravel) technologies.
bulletPoints: Taught frontend fundamentals: HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
Instructed on advanced frontend: React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Covered backend basics: PHP and MySQL.
Trained in Laravel framework for advanced backend development.
Guided students through full-stack project implementation.

timeline.summary: Designed UI/UX and branding with Figma, and developed full-stack systems while managing deployment, hosting, and domains.
bulletPoints: Designed user interfaces, website structures, and company logos using Figma.
Selected cohesive color schemes for branding consistency.
Built full-stack systems (frontend + backend) from scratch.
Managed domain registration, hosting setup, and deployment.
Ensured seamless end-to-end web development and launch.

timeline.summary: Designed, tested, and deployed scalable systems while managing 70+ Agile sprints.
bulletPoints: Developed scalable backend services using Php and Laravel framework.
Designed and integrated scalable software systems to support business operations.
Designed and optimized database schemas for performance and scalability.
Led full-cycle project execution from planning to delivery, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Worked closely with mobile developers to design APIs and ensure smooth integration with the frontend.

timeline.summary: Developed full-stack projects using Vue.js and Laravel, managed Git repositories, and resolved technical issues.
bulletPoints: Built full-stack applications using Vue.js (frontend) and Laravel (backend).
Designed and implemented new software solutions to enhance system performance.
Managed projects and version control using Git/GitHub.
Set up and maintained APIs for seamless system integration.
Collaborated with team leads to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.

timeline.summary: Learned front-end web development fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and built 5+ static/dynamic websites.
bulletPoints: Mastered front-end fundamentals: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Built 5+ static and dynamic websites for hands-on practice.
Developed problem-solving skills through coding projects.
Gained foundational knowledge of web development concepts.
Applied learning to create functional web projects.

services.name: Premium Full-Stack Web Development
services.desc: From sleek frontends to robust backends, I build fast, scalable, and secure web applications tailored to your business needs.

services.name: Expert UI/UX Design + Frontend Development
services.desc: I craft stunning, user-friendly interfaces with pixel-perfect attention to detail—ensuring your audience stays engaged.

services.name: 1-on-1 Web Dev Mentorship & Training
services.desc: Personalized coaching for aspiring developers (or teams) to master modern web development—from basics to advanced projects.

testimonials.name: Devi Widjayanti
testimonials.review: Beneran recommended! Aku pesan website toko online pakai React + Laravel, loadingnya ngebut banget! Ga pernah down meski visitor ribuan. Pelayanannya fast respon banget!

testimonials.name: Abdulaziz Basha
testimonials.review: !والله شاطر ومخلص، شغل لارافل عنده قوي ومتين يا ريت كل المطورين زيه! ما يقصر أبدًا ويشتغل باحترافية 😍

testimonials.name: Ahmed Al-Awadi
testimonials.review: يا رجل! سوالنا موقع بالرياكت واللارافل... والله شيء خيالي! السرعة والإتقان في الشغل، الله يبارك فيه. أي حد عنده مشروع ويب، هذا الرجل ينفذه!

testimonials.name: Riszky Pratama
testimonials.review: Gak nyesel hire dia! Bikin sistem admin pakai Laravel, rapih banget kodenya. Fix bug cepet, harganya juga fair. Bakal pake jasanya lagi next project!

testimonials.name: Mohamed Abu Ghazalah
testimonials.review: بالعقل! سوّيت معاه أبلكيشن للمطعم بالرياكت  والزبائن كلهم يحبوا التصميم! وإذا بدي تعديل، يقول 'تمام' ويعدله فوري. إنسان مضمون ١٠٠٪👌
